``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {#1a104ceb .cell execution_count=44} ``` {.python .cell-code} @torch.no_grad() def sample2(model, sz): ps = next(model.parameters()) x_t = torch.randn(sz).to(ps) sample_at = {t for t in range(n_steps) if (t+101)%((t+101)//100)==0} preds = [] for t in reversed(range(n_steps)): t_batch = torch.full((x_t.shape[0],), t, device=ps.device, dtype=torch.long) z = (torch.randn(x_t.shape) if t > 0 else torch.zeros(x_t.shape)).to(ps) ᾱ_t1 = alphabar[t-1] if t > 0 else torch.tensor(1) b̄_t = 1-alphabar[t] b̄_t1 = 1-ᾱ_t1 if t in sample_at: noise = model((x_t, t_batch)) x_0_hat = ((x_t - b̄_t.sqrt() * noise)/alphabar[t].sqrt()) x_t = x_0_hat * ᾱ_t1.sqrt()*(1-alpha[t])/b̄_t + x_t * alpha[t].sqrt()*b̄_t1/b̄_t + sigma[t]*z if t in sample_at: preds.append(x_t.float().cpu()) return preds ``` ::: ::: {#f76a4761 .cell execution_count=45} ``` {.python .cell-code} %%time samples = sample2(model, (n_samples, 1, 32, 32)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ::: {.ansi-escaped-output} ```{=html}
